message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable to your endeavors.
Hi Alice, $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $12,000.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is closer to my bottom line. Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?
Alice, I'm still only able to offer $12,000. This is my final offer, I'm happy to walk away if it's not acceptable.
